docs.snippet: Carmelo Anthony planned to explore free agency, he said as he prepared for the N.B.A. All-Star Game, but his “first priority” was to re-sign with his current team....
docs.lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony planned to explore free agency, he said as he prepared for the N.B.A. All-Star Game, but his “first priority” was to re-sign with his current team.
docs.abstract: New York Knicks star forward Carmelo Anthony reaffirms that his first priority is to re-sign with team this summer, saying he would be willing to take a pay cut to give team greater flexibility to assemble championship team; notes that he will still explore free agency.

headline.main: Anthony Open to Pay Cut to Bolster Knicks
headline.print_headline: Anthony Open to Pay Cut to Bolster Knicks

docs.snippet: Montrezl Harrell had a career-high 22 points, and No. 13 Louisville built a 30-point first-half lead en route to an 82-58 win at Temple....

docs.abstract: Louisville routes Temple, 82-58; other men's college basketball news noted.

docs.snippet: All Times ESTSunday, Feb. 16AUTO RACING1 p.m....

The U.S. speed skating team want to ditch the Under Armour Olympic outfits that media reports have linked to a dismal showing at the Sochi Games, reverting to apparel worn during recent World Cup events....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. speed skating team want to ditch the Under Armour Olympic outfits that media reports have linked to a dismal showing at the Sochi Games, reverting to apparel worn during recent World Cup events.
